name: Bitcoin icon set
description:
A set of icons to cover typical needs by Bitcoin applications. Includes common generic icons like arrows, but also more unique ones like a wallet, keys, mining, and Bitcoin symbols.


This set grew out of the Bitcoin Wallet UI kit and can be used independently or together with the UI kit.


So this is a free and open resource. If you see something missing or want to fine-tune some vectors, just duplicate the file, make changes, post it as a remix, and leave a comment.


Also see the Github repo for this icon to request new icons, have discussions and all that fun stuff. Check it. Plus there's a website now at bitcoinicons.com, as well as Vue and React modules.


The Bitcoin symbol is public domain.


September 27, 2021

Minor icon tweaks for the 0.1.7 release. Yes, now there's a proper release process.


September 13, 2021

Larger revision of the icon set for use in Vue and React components (inline SVG rendering has certain limitations that need to be considered during icon design).


April 26, 2021

Icons are now grid-based and much more consistent. Revised pretty much all icons, and added a few new ones.


March 22, 2021

Added various icons from comparing to icons the Specter app uses. Also various minor clean-ups.


March 15, 2021

Added more icons unique to Bitcoin (Lightning, node, mnemonic), and cleaned up a few other ones.


March 2, 2021

Posted this first version. Lots of details to refine. Icons are mostly generic (few unique ones to Bitcoin).
